word: Just before He bent His footsteps to the garden, Jesus had said to the disciples, \93All ye shall be offended because of Me this night.\94 They had given Him the strongest assurance that they would go with Him to prison and to death. And poor, self-sufficient Peter had added, \93Although all shall be offended, yet will not I.\94 Mark 14:27, 29.  The Desire of Ages, pp. 686-688.57
